column1: The Petitioner who is a retired military officer had alleged before us that a part of his pension had been

column2: deducted with effect from January  2016 without giving any valid  reason  and/or conducting an  inquiry
He  further  submitted before  this  court that  when  he  has  attached  to  the  Ordinance  Unit  Maradana  as
